about us

Discover Our Story and Mission

EzyRent is revolutionizing property rentals across Nigeria and Africa. Making it seamless to find, rent or sell homes from anywhere in the world. With user-first approach, we eliminate the hassle of agent fees and bring transparency , convenience, and security to the rental process - all from the comfort of your home.

Reviews

Hear from our community:

Discover what Property managers, Landlords, and Tenants are saying about their experience. Real stories. Real feedback.

Chizoba Nnamdi

property manager

As a property manager overseeing various rental properties, this platform has been a game changer. The ability to manage multiple properties from a single dashboard is incredibly convenient. 

Frequently Asked Questions

Your questions, Answered

App Only Features

Secure Payment

The platform includes an escrow service for rent payments, ensuring that funds are securely held until both parties meet their obligations, providing peace of mind for both tenants and landlords.

Property Listings

Detailed property listings with high-quality images, accurate descriptions, and price information.

Direct Communucation

In-app messaging that allows tenants to easily communicate with landlords or property managers.

Rental Payment

Flexible payment options, including subscription-based models and token-based payments, catering to different user preferences.

Property Management

For landlords not residing in the same region as their properties, EzyRent offers property management services to handle tenant interactions, maintenance, and other responsibilities.

Verified Listings

Ensuring that all properties listed are verified to prevent fraudulent activities.

Analytics and Insights

Tools for landlords to track property engagement and manage their listings effectively.

Notification Alerts

Personalized alerts for new properties that match tenants’ preferences.
